txt.en: What was so special about this locket that to make it worth dying for?

Clutched in this dwarf's cold, rigid hand is a beautifully hand-carved locket. After fiddling with it for a little while, its puzzle reveals itself, and it swivels open to show two tiny engravings: two bearded dwarf-faces.

The Orc Watch is the main Iron Garrison settlement in the Redhorn Lodes, located on the western side of that area.\n\nThere are many dwarves at the Orc-watch. Perhaps one of them knows why the recently deceased Nykr valued this little hand-made locket so highly.
'I'm afraid I don't recognize that. Sorry.'

The Orc Watch can be reached by going north from the Deep Descent, then east from the Dolven-view, and then south-east.\n\nThere are many dwarves at the Orc-watch. Perhaps one of them knows why the recently deceased Nykr valued this little hand-made locket so highly.
'I do not know what is so special about that locket, that Nykr would die for it. Perhaps someone at the Orc-watch will know.'
'That is a wonderful little trinket. \n\n'No, I can't help you; I've never seen it before.'
'Welcome, [placeholder]! How may I...where on earth did you get that locket? Speak up!'
'My, what fine craftsmanship! 'Tis a thing of beauty, and this little puzzle mechanism is ingenious! I fear that my appreciation is all I can offer, though, for I do not recognize this locket.'
'Welcome, [placeholder]! How may I - where on earth did you get that locket? Speak up!'
Find someone at the Orc-watch who recognizes the locket.
Find someone at the Orc-watch who recognizes the locket.
